import LightColors from '@site/src/components/Docs/Colors/LightColors';

:::note
First of all you need to install `@flexnative/theme-context`.
Fallow instructions here on **[how to install and how to use](../getting-started/installation.mdx)** `@flexnative/theme-context`.
:::

**[BaseTheme](/docs/getting-started/setup-@flexnative/theme-provider#basetheme)** object is where you define your application's color palette.

By default there are two color palette `light` or `dark` from `@flexnative/theme-context`.
You also can extend [`BaseTheme`](/docs/getting-started/setup-@flexnative/theme-provider#basetheme) object to add custom/extra colors.
Fallow the section on [how customizing default theme colors](./consuming-theme.mdx)
or [how to extend of default theme colors](./extend-theme.mdx).
